subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Healthy for the first time in two years, Magglio Ordóñez is running and hitting like the player the Tigers hoped they were getting when they signed him to a five-year, $75 million free-agent deal, plus options and incentives, after the 2004 season.
snippet: Healthy for the first time in two years, Magglio Ordóñez is running and hitting like the player the Tigers hoped they were getting when they signed him to a five-year, $75 million free-agent deal, plus options and incentives, after the 2004 season.
